resources.string: Hi, myself Tanvi Verma, a student of B.Tech Engineering at Indira Gandhi Delhi Technical University for Women, Delhi. I am a second year student in Computer Science and Engineering. Zealous about programming and learning I joined in here and wish to sail through it far and wide.

Apart from the curriculum I am interested in music and dance as well. Let me tell you something. I am a Kpop fan as well and interested in basketball. Reading, trekking and act play are some of my hobbies.
Serving as a TNP Volunteer since January 2022 to present so as to ensure timely and the best possible opportunities to the students.
Member of the Google Developer Students Club - IGDTUW, a developer group powered by Google Developers to learn, share, connect and develop skills.
Member of the CodeChef IGDTUW chapter, an online educational program and competitive programming community of global programmers.
Head Coordinator at Innerve, the technical fest of IGDTUW.
Head Coordinator at Taarangana, the cultural fest of IGDTUW.

Innovative, task driven individual with learned experience in design and development. Proficient in developing databases, creating user interfaces, writing and testing codes. Able to work well in teams and individually. Aiming to be a full-stack developer.
